Keywords: Mystical , New Mutants , X-Men
Real Name: Illyana Rasputin
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
I'LL KICK THE DOOR OPEN: Charge, Phasing/Teleport. When Magik moves, after resolutions generate a Stepping Disc marker in the square she began her movement in. // Friendly characters within 2 squares of the Stepping Disc marker can use "FREE: Place this character into an unoccupied square with that Stepping Disc marker." //?At the beginning of your turn, remove all Stepping Disc markers.
I LEARNED SOMETHING NEW: When Magik hits with a close attack, after resolutions you may place a hit target in a square adjacent to her.
WHEN THE FIGHTING STARTS, STAY CLOSE TO ME: Combat Reflexes, Defend, Toughness.
Figure Errata
Changed I'LL KICK THE DOOR OPEN

November 18, 2022
stingnewell
Kazar welcomes Magik to the hunt.
November 8, 2022
tidge
Obviously some will weep over the lost prospect of free-popping a character all the way across the map. With THAT off-the-table it is possible to more realistically evaluate the dial, and role on a team. Spend +5 points on a Sword Object to get maximum offense (i.e. B/C/F) from her. The Soulsword is an obvious choice, Warlock isn't bad either. Leverage her Move+Attack to move short distances, allowing nearby teammates (with their own move+attack) to get a little bit more reach themselves. Reposition hit opponents as necessary. Keep friendlies adjacent to Magik to do all of that, and to benefit from Defend and (possibly) Leadership. The dial is a solid alternative to the Regenesis Chase, at a lower point value.
November 8, 2022
SolussMusic
After the errata, I am trying to find a use to one of my favorite characters of all time... the errata was... not good.

[QUOTE=Mateodh;12212254]Give Magik the Cloak, have her move 10, placing a Disc where she left. Sidestep placing another Disc. As long as a Friendly is within 2 of the first Disc, they can be placed in the Second Disc 10 squares away.[/QUOTE] As cool as that strategy is, you can’t activate the same FREE action twice per turn so I’m unsure if that would work EDIT: actually never mind I just reread the power and realized that yeah apparently you can do that. Really cool! Who needs a sword when ya got that neat combo! :D
September 6, 2022
Mateodh
Give Magik the Cloak, have her move 10, placing a Disc where she left. Sidestep placing another Disc. As long as a Friendly is within 2 of the first Disc, they can be placed in the Second Disc 10 squares away.
